data.event: The municipality is now included in the Drava statistical region.

event.title: was mentioned in written sources in 1245

data.event: Fala was mentioned in written sources in 1245 as in domo Volmari (and as de Valle in 1279, Vall and Valle in 1289, and Fall in 1495).

event.title: included it in its register of monuments of national importance in 2008

data.event: As a technological and construction achievement of its time, the Slovenian Ministry of Culture included it in its register of monuments of national importance in 2008.
